Package net.i2p.servlet.filters

package net.i2p.servlet.filters

XSS filter, since 0.9.14.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    net.i2p.servlet
    RequestWrapper was a susimail class, moved from susimail to jetty-i2p.jar when we needed them in the router console also.
    net.i2p.servlet.util
    Small utilities for servlets.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    XI2PLocationFilter
    Adds a header, X-I2P-Location, to requests when they do **not** come in on an I2P hostname.
